SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ApplicationGui
The ApplicationGui class represents the main GUI application for the game, handling the initialization, scene management, and various interactions.
AsyncHandler
Provides a shared queue and executor service for asynchronous printing tasks.
AsyncLogger
An asynchronous logger that logs messages to the console using a shared queue.
AsyncLogger.CustomFormatter
Custom formatter to colorize log messages based on their logging level.
AsyncPrint
Utility class for asynchronous printing to the console using a shared queue.
BackGold
This class represents the back of a Gold card.
BackResource
This class represents the back of a Resource card.
BackSide
This class represents the back of a card.
BackStarter
This class represents the back of a Starter card.
CalculateScoreStrategy
This interface defines the method for calculating Objective card points.
CalculateScoreStrategyAdapter
This class is used to provide Gson with a custom TypeAdapter to handle the deserialization of classes that implement the CalculateScoreStrategy interface.
CannotJoinGameException
Exception thrown when an attempt to join a game fails because the game's status is not WAITING.
Card
This class represents a card in the game.
CardGold
This class represents a Gold card.
CardNotFoundException
Exception thrown when a specified card is not found in the game.
CardObjective
This class represents a Objective card.
CardObjectiveController
Controller for handling the selection of the Objective card.
CardResource
This class represents a Resource card.
CardStarter
This class represents a Starter card.
CardStarterController
Controller for handling the selection of the Starter card side.
CharColor
Enum representing various character colors for text display.
CharSpecial
Class representing a special character with a specific color.
ChatMessage
This class represents a message in the chat.
ChooseSizeController
Controller class for handling the lobby screen in the GUI.
ClientAction
This class represents the actions that a client can perform within the game.
ClientHandler
The ClientHandler class processes incoming requests from clients to perform actions like creating, joining, leaving, or reconnecting to a game.
Codex
This class represents a Codex.
Color
This enumeration class represents the colors players can have.
Coords
Class representing coordinates with x and y values.
DeckType
Enumeration representing the different types of decks in the game.
Desk
This class represents the game board.
DeskIsFullException
Exception thrown when an attempt is made to add a card to a desk that is already full.
Event
This class represents an event in the game.
EventList
This class represents a list of events in the game, implemented as a FIFO queue.
EventType
Enumeration of event types used in the game.
Flow
This class manages the flow of the game, handling the user interface (UI) and the events.
FrontGold
This class represents the front of a Gold card.
FrontResource
This class represents the front of a Resource card.
FrontStarter
This class represents the front of a Starter card.
Game
This class represents a game.
GameController
This class controls the gameplay flow of a match, from start to finish.
GameControllerInterface
The GameControllerInterface defines the contract for controlling the gameplay flow of a match, from start to finish.
GameIdController
Controller class for handling game ID input in the GUI.
GameImmutable
This class represents the Game class, but made immutable.
GameListener
This interface is used to inform the client about changes in the game.
GameListenerHandlerClient
This class implements the GameListener interface and handles game events by delegating actions to the Flow object.
GameListenerHandlerServer
This class facilitates communication of GameListener events to the client over a socket connection.
GameRunningController
Controller that manages the game scene.
GameStatus
This enumeration class represents the available statuses of the game.
GameTitleController
Controller class for handling the game title screen in the GUI.
GenericController
Abstract class representing a generic controller for the GUI.
Gui
The Gui class represents the graphical user interface for the game, extending the abstract UI class and implementing its methods.
InputProcessor
The InputProcessor class processes input commands and messages, managing the game flow and interactions.
InputQueue
A thread-safe queue to handle input data for processing.
InputReader
Interface for reading input and providing an input queue.
InputReaderGUI
Input reader implementation for a GUI.
InputReaderTUI
Input reader implementation for a Text User Interface (TUI).
Kingdom
This enumeration class represents the available kingdoms in the game.
ListenersHandler
This class manages a list of GameListener objects and notifies the view when changes occur int the Game.
LobbyController
Controller class for handling the lobby screen in the GUI.
LobbyPlayerController
Controller class for handling the display of a player in the lobby screen.
MainClient
Main class for the client application.
MainController
MainController is a singleton that manages the creation and joining of games.
MainControllerInterface
The MainControllerInterface defines the contract for managing the lifecycle and interactions of multiple game sessions within the application.
MainDiagonalStrategy
This class calculates the points of Objective cards that use the main diagonal.
MainServer
Main class for starting the server.
MenuController
Controller class for handling menu actions in the GUI.
MessageType
Enum MessageType defines the types of messages that can be sent from the client to the server.
NicknameController
Controller class for handling nickname input in the GUI.
NoMoreCardException
Exception thrown when an attempt is made to draw a card from an empty deck.
NoSuchGameException
Exception thrown when an attempt is made to interact with a game that does not exist.
OptionSelection
The OptionSelection enum represents different options for user interface and connection types.
PileBottomLeftStrategy
This class calculates the points of Objective cards that use the pile starting from the bottom left corner of a card.
PileBottomRightStrategy
This class calculates the points of Objective cards that use the pile starting from the bottom right corner of a card.
PileTopLeftStrategy
This class calculates the points of Objective cards that use the pile starting from the top left corner of a card.
PileTopRightStrategy
This class calculates the points of Objective cards that use the pile starting from the top right corner of a card.
Player
This class represents a player in the game.
PlayerAction
This is the enumeration of the available player's statuses (or actions).
PlayerAlreadyJoinedException
Exception thrown when an attempt is made to add a player to a game when the player is already part of the game.
PopupController
Controller class for handling error messages in the GUI.
RequirementStrategy
This class calculates the points of Objective cards that use the number of values.
RmiClient
The RmiClient class handles the connection to the RMI server and allows clients to interact with the game through remote method invocations.
RmiServer
The RMIServer class handles incoming RMI requests from clients.
SceneEnum
The SceneEnum class holds the file paths for the FXML files of the various scenes.
Scenes
The Scenes class represents a JavaFX scene and its associated controller.
SecondaryDiagonalStrategy
This class calculates the points of Objective cards that use the secondary diagonal.
Side
This class manages the information present on both the front and back of a card.
SideView
Class responsible for generating a visual representation of a side of a card.
SocketClient
The ClientSocket class handles all network communications between the client and the server using sockets.
SocketClientGenericMessage
Abstract class representing a generic message sent from the client to the server.
SocketClientMessageCreateGame
This class is used to send a message from the client to the server to indicate the intention to create a new game.
SocketClientMessageDrawCardDisplayed
This class is used to send a message from the client to the server to indicate the intent to draw a card from the visible cards.
SocketClientMessageDrawCardFromDeck
This class is used to send a message from the client to the server to indicate the intent to draw a card from a deck of cards.
SocketClientMessageJoinFirstGame
This class is used to send a message from the client to the server to request joining the first available game.
SocketClientMessageJoinSpecificGame
This class represents a message sent from the client to the server to request joining a specific game.
SocketClientMessageLeaveGame
This class is used to send a message from the client to the server to indicate the intent to leave the game.
SocketClientMessageNewChatMessage
This class is used to send a message from the client to the server to indicate the intention to send a new chat message.
SocketClientMessagePing
This class is used to send a ping message from the client to the server.
SocketClientMessagePlaceCardOnCodex
This class is used to send a message from the client to the server to indicate the intent to place a card into the Codex.
SocketClientMessagePlaceStarterOnCodex
This class is used to send a message from the client to the server to indicate the intent to place the Starter card into the Codex.
SocketClientMessageReconnectToGame
This class is used to send a message from the client to the server to indicate the intention to reconnect to a game.
SocketClientMessageSelectCardObjective
This class is used to send a message from the client to the server to indicate the intent to select the personal Objective card.
SocketClientMessageSetGameSize
This class is used to send a message from the client to the server to indicate the intent to change the game size.
SocketServer
The SocketServer class handles incoming network request and spawns a ClientHandler to manage each client connection.
SocketServerGenericMessage
Abstract class representing a generic message that is sent from the server to the client.
SocketServerMessageAddedPoint
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the points have been added.
SocketServerMessageAddedPointObjective
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the points obtained with the Objective cards have been calculated.
SocketServerMessageCanNotPlaceCard
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that a card cannot be placed.
SocketServerMessageCardAddedToHand
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that a card has been successfully added to his hand.
SocketServerMessageCardNotAddedToHand
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that a card was not added to his hand.
SocketServerMessageDeckHasNoCards
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that a deck has no cards.
SocketServerMessageDrawCard
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that a player has to draw a card.
SocketServerMessageEndGameConditionsReached
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the conditions to end the game have been reached.
SocketServerMessageGameCreated
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that a game has been created.
SocketServerMessageGameEnded
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the game has ended.
SocketServerMessageGameIdNotExists
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the game id doesn't exist.
SocketServerMessageGameSizeUpdated
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the points obtained with the Objective cards have been calculated.
SocketServerMessageGameStarted
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the game has started.
SocketServerMessageIndexNotValid
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the index is invalid.
SocketServerMessageInvalidCoordinates
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the coordinates where he wants to insert the card are not valid.
SocketServerMessageJoinUnableGameFull
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that a player tried to join a full game.
SocketServerMessageJoinUnableNicknameAlreadyInUse
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that a player tried to use a nickname that is already in use.
SocketServerMessageLastCircle
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the last circle has started.
SocketServerMessageNextTurn
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the next turn triggered.
SocketServerMessageNoGameToReconnect
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that there is no game to reconnect.
SocketServerMessageObjectiveCardChosen
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the Objective card was chosen correctly.
SocketServerMessageObjectiveCardNotChosen
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the Objective card was not chosen correctly.
SocketServerMessageOnlyOnePlayerConnected
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that only one player is connected.
SocketServerMessagePlayerDisconnected
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that a player has disconnected.
SocketServerMessagePlayerJoined
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that a player has joined the game.
SocketServerMessagePlayerLeft
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that a player has left the game.
SocketServerMessagePlayerReconnected
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that a player has reconnected to the game.
SocketServerMessagePositionedCardIntoCodex
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the card was placed into the Codex.
SocketServerMessagePositionedStarterCardIntoCodex
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the Starter card was placed into the Codex.
SocketServerMessageRequirementsPlacementNotRespected
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that the positioning requirements are not respected.
SocketServerMessageSentChatMessage
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform that a message has been sent.
SocketServerMessageWinnerDeclared
This class is used to send a message from the server to the client to inform which players won the game.
Tui
The TUI user interface class.
UI
Abstract class for defining the user interface (GUI or TUI).
Value
This enumeration class represents the values that can be present on the front and back of the cards.
WinnersController
Controller class for displaying the winners in the GUI.
